name: WCF and ASP.NET Web API
caption: msdn.microsoft.com
description: WCF is Microsoft’s unified programming model for building service-oriented applications. It enables developers to build secure, reliable, transacted solutions that integrate across platforms and interoperate with existing investments. data.message: For short, forget WCF entirely unless you are forced to consume/publish SOAP, or work on TCP level or so
